phoenixGym.title: Phoenix-Gymnasium
phoenixGym.description: I successfully completed my high school diploma at the Phoenix-Gymnasium. I had the advanced course in computer science in the Abitur.

fhDortmund.title: FH Dortmund Business Informatics Bsc.
fhDortmund.description: During my studies at the University of Applied Sciences in Dortmund, I learned Java in great depth. I also had insights into the areas of software engineering and web technologies.
